education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Electrical & Electronics Engineering
education.highlights: Focus: Computational Logic and Software Architecture

experience.summary: Full-stack and Backend specialist focused on AI integration, secure authentication, and database optimization.
bullets: Architected scalable REST APIs and AI pipelines using FastAPI, Python, and SQLAlchemy, achieving 20-35% performance gains.
Built a RAG-powered authentication AI chatbot reducing support workload by ~45% via LangChain and caching.
Designed secure authentication flows (JWT, OAuth2, RBAC) and optimized PostgreSQL schemas for high-concurrency systems.
Created reusable backend service templates reducing project initialization time by 50%.

projects.name: SniperHire-V1 (Autonomous AI Orchestrator)
bullets: Developed autonomous workflow processing 50+ job descriptions daily, extracting requirements with 92% accuracy and performing ATS scoring targeting 85-95% pass rates.
Built RAG pipeline for intelligent keyword injection and resume tailoring via Jinja2 with async processing for real-time generation.
Implemented system design patterns and async I/O pipelines reducing resume generation time from 2min to 15 seconds per document.
Engineered a dual-interface system including a Streamlit Web UI for rapid prototyping and a Python CLI for automated batch processing and developer workflows.

projects.name: AI Authentication Chatbot (RAG + Verification)
bullets: Built LLM-powered assistant handling 1000+ verification and onboarding queries with 98% accuracy.
Optimized retrieval latency by 30% using embeddings caching, chunk compression, and async search pipelines.
Integrated token-based authentication and rate limiting, preventing abuse while serving 50+ concurrent users.

projects.name: AyoMama Hackathon – AI Maternal Support
bullets: Co-led backend development using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL, building production-ready APIs for 5+ endpoints.
Built secure REST APIs with medical content filtering and AI-powered chatbot, ensuring HIPAA-compliant data handling.
Delivered MVP in 48 hours, earning recognition for technical leadership and architecture design.

projects.name: BidBuy Marketplace – Schema & Auth Design
bullets: Designed normalized PostgreSQL schemas supporting complex user roles, permissions, and session management for 10,000+ users.
Implemented Dockerized deployment with secure password hashing, bcrypt encryption, and login attempt tracking.
Reduced authentication latency by 25% through query optimization and caching strategies.

projects.name: Task Manager App (Productivity System)
bullets: Built full-stack system with automated task scoring algorithm, priority analytics, and intelligent reminders.
Integrated FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL and Docker, enabling seamless team collaboration with 99.5% uptime.
Implemented dashboard analytics improving team task completion rates by 35%.
